title: NPCI International to develop UPI-like real-time payments platform in Trinidad and Tobago
description: NPCI International Payments Limited has partnered with Trinidad and Tobago's Ministry of Digital Transformation to develop a real-time payments platform similar to India's UPI. This initiative aims to enhance financial inclusion and modernize the country's financial ecosystem, facilitating both person-to-person and person-to-merchant transactions.
